description:
Having gained experience as a Gunpla builder, http://anidb.net/ch93533 [Riku] assembled this Gunpla with the concept that the http://anidb.net/ch93538 [Gundam 00 Diver], his first machine, were being made by his current self. The Arc Drive units on its shoulders incorporate a new "GN Burst" mechanism inspired by the http://anidb.net/ch46920 [Gundam AGE-FX].
Source: Official page
name: GN-0000DVR/II Gundam 00 Diver Arc
